entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
